products.title: Iced Americano
products.description: A refreshing coffee beverage made by pouring shots of espresso over ice water. It's known for its bold and smooth flavor, with a refreshing kick from the ice.

products.title: Iced Cappuccino
products.description: Espresso with cold milk and ice, topped with a generous layer of frothy milk foam.

products.title: Iced Espresso
products.description: Shots of espresso over ice. It delivers a concentrated burst of flavor, with the ice adding a refreshing element to the beverage.

products.title: Iced Latte
products.description: Espresso with cold milk and ice. It offers a smooth and creamy texture, with the rich flavor of espresso perfectly complemented by the chilled milk.

products.title: Hot Americano
products.description: Classic coffee beverage consisting of hot water poured over shots of espresso.

products.title: Hot Cappuccino
products.description: Made by combining equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

products.title: Hot Espresso
products.description: Hot Espresso is the pure essence of coffee, consisting solely of a concentrated shot of espresso served piping hot.

products.title: Hot Latte
products.description: A Hot Latte is a comforting and creamy coffee beverage made by combining espresso with steamed milk.

products.title: Strawberry Smoothie
products.description: Made by blending ripe strawberries with yogurt, milk, and ice. It offers a vibrant pink color and a deliciously sweet and tangy flavor.

products.title: Red Berry Smoothie
products.description: Made by blending ripe red berry with yogurt, milk, and ice. It offers a vibrant pink color and a deliciously sweet and tangy flavor.

products.title: Pineapple Smoothie
products.description: Made by blending ripe pineapple with yogurt, milk, and ice. It offers a vibrant pink color and a deliciously sweet and tangy flavor.

products.title: Spinach Smoothie
products.description: Made by blending ripe spinach with yogurt, milk, and ice. It offers a vibrant pink color and a deliciously sweet and tangy flavor.
